attributes.action: Electrical installation work only completed by registered electrician
attributes.additional_details: Make electrical installation works all notifyable and installed by registered electricians only
attributes.background: Hold the NICEIC or similar bodies Accountable to take more action in being responsible for all electrical installation work being installed in the UK

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure what you mean by 'hold accountable'.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
